comment.author: 70864185@N00
comment._content: According to the RTA website, Sydney's first traffic lights were installed at the intersection of Market and Kent streets and switched on at 11am on Friday 13 October 1933. I'd hazard a guess given the houses in the background that these are an example from among the first but not the actual first themselves.

comment.author: 63609691@N00
comment._content: Remember same as Samdefranc... Market St, Sydney.  This background looks like Bondi Beach.
